      • setHappenwho

        public void setHappenwho(java.lang.String vic)
        Set the person who report this crime is witness or victim etc..

        The parameter can be 4 possibility 'I saw something', 'I need help' 'something happen to me' or no input

        Parameters:
        vic - 'tome' : somehting happen to me, 'saw': I saw something, 'help':I need help and 'NULL':no input from user.

      • getHappenwho

        public java.lang.String getHappenwho()
        Returns the person who report this crime is witness or victim etc..
        Returns:
        'tome' : somehting happen to me, 'saw': I saw something, 'help':I need help and 'NULL':no input from user.
